page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: In the past this area was served by the Wishaw and Newmains Branch passenger railway line now closed. The only remaining railway line is the mineral line serving the concrete works formerly the site of the Coltness Iron Works (closed 1948) {(GR.824553)}. Newmains cross{(GR.824561)}is the focus of several important route ways 1.{A73(T)}North/South link road (enters area at{GR.820570}leaves at {GR.830540). 2.{A71}Edinburgh-Kilmarnock (enters area at{GR.840570}leaves at {GR.811540). 3.{A722}Newmains cross-Motherwell {(GR.824561}and leaves area at {GR.800583). Even although there are motorways in the area these roads are still heavily used.
